title: Wells Fargo
description: Developed a Sports App facilitating communication between sponsors and event parties. Utilized MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) for full-stack development. Enabled secure transaction processing between sponsors and event parties. Incorporated real-time chat functionality for negotiations and deal finalization. Developed and maintained user authentication and authorization features.
